com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.event

Class EventBusService<T extends Event>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flamingOctoIronman.framework.event.EventBusService<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CoreEventBusService, InputEventBusService

    public abstract class EventBusService<T extends Event>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to handle the subscribing and publishing of events. It provides the basic framework to create an event bus for a given module. Type T has to extend Event.
    Author:
    Quint

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,T> eventMap
      This HashMap Stores a key/pair of the simple name of every T and T instance.
      private java.util.ServiceLoader<T> loader
      This loads all the Events.

    • Field Detail

      • loader

        private java.util.ServiceLoader<T extends Event> loader
        This loads all the Events. For a class to be loaded, it must extend T, and must be registered in T's class manifest.

      • eventMap

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,T extends Event> eventMap
        This HashMap Stores a key/pair of the simple name of every T and T instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EventBusService

        public EventBusService(java.util.ServiceLoader<T> loader)
        Creates a new EventBusService. Initialize references and loop through all the T in the loader and add them to the eventMap
        Parameters:
        loader - A ServiceLoader instance with all the T classes loaded.

    • Method Detail

      • getEventIterator

        public java.util.Iterator<T> getEventIterator()
        Returns a copy of the ServiceLoader's Iterator.
        Returns:
        A copy of the ServiceLoader's Iterator

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.Object subscriber)
        Subscribes an Object to the Events
        Parameters:
        subscriber - Object that is subscribing to an event.

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.Class<?> subscriber)
        Subscribes a class's static methods to the events.
        Parameters:
        subscriber - Class that is subscribing to the events.

      • publish

        public void publish(java.lang.Class<? extends Event> event)
        Publishes a core event.
        Parameters:
        event - Class simple name of the event that is being published.
